title: Log In to Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is not logged into an entitled account

AND

+ The user is navigating the app from the
- Watch Tab
- Scores Tab
- Home Tab
- Gameday
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The User attempts to launch video playback for a game from a game tile, MLB.tv button, or Games EPG button
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe a paywall

AND

+ The user can log in with an entitled account

AND

+ The user will be sent to the Games EPG page after a successful login attempt

AND

+ The user can select the game for immediate video playback

title: Log In to Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

The user is not logged into an entitled account

AND

The user is navigating the app from the

- Watch Tab
- Scores Tab
- Home Tab
- Gameday
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The User attempts to launch audio playback for a game from a game tile, Audio button, or Audio EPG button
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe a paywall

AND

+ The user can log in with an entitled account

AND

+ The user will be sent to the Audio EPG page after a successful login attempt

AND

+ The user can select the game for immediate audio playback

title: Apple TV+ Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. A game is broadcasted on Apple TV+
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user views the following areas:
- Games segment on Watch tab
- Watch Now segment on Watch tab
- Watch Now games carousel on Watch tab
- Scoreboard on Scores tab
- Scoreboard on Home tab
- Scoreboard on Team page
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will observe the Apple TV+ logo

AND

1. For non-Watch Now tiles, the Apple TV+ logo will not be displayed

AND

1. "Watch on Apple TV+" or "Live on Apple TV+" copy will be available

AND

1. The Apple TV+ logo will be displayed on the game tile and hero image on the Watch Now segment

title: Apple TV+ Blackout Messaging
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has attempted to launch a game that is streaming on Apple TV+
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user observes the Apple TV blackout message

title: Apple TV+ Deeplink Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. An Apple TV+ game is live in the Apple TV app
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the game tile or mlb.tv link for an exclusive Friday Night Apple TV+ game
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will be asked if they would like to leave the MLB app and navigate to Apple TV

AND

1. If yes, the user will be deeplinked to the proper MLB section of the Apple TV app

AND

1. The user can watch the MLB game on the Apple TV app without issues

title: Canadian Blackout - Postseason
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is located in Canada

AND

+ Is logged into an account that has mlb.tv entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user attempts to launch the MVPD-authorized postseason game from the Games or Watch Now segment, Scores page, Home or Team Page, and Gameday
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The canadian user will observe a blackout message stating that all canada-based users are ineligible to watch the game due to International blackout restrictions

title: MVPD Flow to Playback - Postseason
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is located in the United States

AND

+ The user is logged into an account that has mlb.tv credentials
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user attempts to launch a postseason game
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be asked to log into their cable MVPD account with a prompt 

AND

+ The user can successfully link their mlb.tv entitlements to their cable provider

AND

+ Playback will begin immediately after a successful authorization

title: Successful Purchase of MLB.tv Monthly or Yearly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the MLB paywall subscriptions page

AND

+ The user selects an MLB.tv Monthly or Yearly package SKU
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user proceeds through the IAP flow within the MLB iOS app
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A successful purchase message is displayed

AND

+ The user is asked if they would like to link their apple purchase to an MLB account

AND 

+ The user can skip this step, and proceed to app navigation, which includes successful game playback.

title: Successful Purchase of MLBN Bundle
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has launched the MLB paywall 

AND

+ Taps the Buy Now option on the MLB Network + At Bat SKU
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ The user successfully navigates through the purchase flow 

AND

+ Observes the Watch Now segment in the Watch tab
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will see MLB Network content 

AND

+ The MLB Network linear stream will launch successfully with playback

AND

+ The Audio EPG also plays back audio-only streams successfully

title: Successful Purchase of At Bat Monthly or Yearly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the MLB paywall subscriptions page

AND

+ The user selects an At Bat Monthly or Yearly package SKU
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user proceeds through the IAP flow within the MLB iOS app
custom_expected:
THEN

+ A successful purchase message is displayed

AND

+ The user is asked if they would like to link their apple purchase to an MLB account

AND 

+ The user can skip this step, and proceed to app navigation, which includes successful audio playback.
